## RoseParams.frameDesign property

Gauge frame design - default: `steelseries.FrameDesign.METAL`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Remarks

ignored if [frameVisible](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.framevisible.md) = `false`
